title: Low Priority Que
body:
Hey, I was placed in low-priority que a while back for leaving games. And when I say awhile I mean awhile. But contrary to what it may seem, I did not leave those games and instead I suffer from extremely bad internet connection and was wondering if my low priority could be removed since now my internet is faster and since I really did not leave those games.

Thanks

replies.body: Even though you didn't intentionally leave those games in the past, the other members of your team were still left without a 5th member. In the long run, you leaving may have been the deciding factor in who won that match. We won't be able to help out with something like this since it wasn't caused by any type of servers issues, but I'd suggest going through some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) in case you start seeing those internet issues again.
I don't think thats possible but Im not sure. You did risk yourself on playing games with lag. You knew the risks and still played.
